title: SMC_CornerDistanceTransitionParam (Function)
text:
FUNCTION SMC_CornerDistanceTransitionParam : ARRAY [0..(SMC_RCNST.MAX_TRANS_PARAMS - 1)] OF LREAL
Sets the transition parameters for distance based blending
(transition mode
MC_TRANSITION_MODE.TMCornerDistance
).
The result can be assigned to a movement function blockâs
TransitionParameter
input.
